MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-OCT-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Cochno Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 2:25PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a suspect fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7PM on 14 October 2020.
